website_summaries.verdict: The RHA MA750 Wireless earphones feature a bright sound signature balanced with rich lows, but it's perhaps a touch too bright at times.
pros: Exceptionally crisp, clear audio with rich lows
Ships with wide range of ear tip options

customer_reviews.title: Beat all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a quest the last month looking for the perfect headphones, after leaving my job working for a subpar headphone manufacturer. In my new headphone I wanted: perfect call quality (from the other person's perspective, audiophile quality music, dual Bluetooth connection without issue (new chromebook pro and a note 8), comfort, vibrate when ringing, sweat proof for rowing, cords that aren't annoying, long battery life, and basically, I just want them to work as advertised. I've tried both sennhiesers, LG, Samsung, Vi, Jaybird, and beats. The RHA's are the only ones to not only meet all of my expectations, they blew them away. Seriously, great job guys. Wow. Recommending to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: TBH

customer_reviews.title: They perform well in most ways - pair easily -retain in your ears adequately - handle phone calls ...
customer_reviews.text: They perform well in most ways - pair easily -retain in your ears adequately - handle phone calls OK but the sound is bright was to be "shrill". Since my primary use will be listening to music with a classical emphasis I could not live with them and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Clousot

customer_reviews.title: By far the best wireless earbuds at this price point
customer_reviews.text: By far the best wireless earbuds at this price point. I've owned the wired MA750i, T20i, and now the wireless MA750. The sound quality is simply amazing for a wireless earbud. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Santana

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The right earbud, due to the cord being a small gage (the left is more robust), fails when the cord entry point to the bud experiences even the slightest stress. This has happened with both pairs I have ordered over the last four months. Great sound, poor engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Tcrow

customer_reviews.title: Great so far, charging finicky
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for several months and they're pretty good. The charging is a bit finicky, they won't charge from pixel USB-C charge brick but will charge from my PC. They also don't ever seem to get to 100% charge and I haven't really tested out the 12hr rated charge time. Sound quality is great, but as others have mentioned I have had problems occasionally with dropouts when playing audio from my phone when it's in my pants pocket. Typically this is when I'm outside working in heavy clothing though. All in all I'm happy with them but am hoping to get a good pair of truly wireless earbuds one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: mrPalomar

customer_reviews.title: all around amazing package (that actually has USB-C charging too)
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for good workout earbuds (as in don't come out while working out or get caught between gym machines and one's body), this is it: the MA750 has great sound quality, is easy to pair, and comes with a generous amount of earbud tips. However, one of the biggest draws for me was that unlike JayBird and Beats (and even Bose), the MA750 actually uses USB-C to charge; this should be standard given how USB-C is the new standard for non-Apple phones, but only RHA and a small amount of others offer this. No need to pay top dollar for a soon-to-be obsolete device or buy essentially obsolete chargers.
customer_reviews.author: 0xc0defeed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Below average for the price I paid for these. 1. The audio disconnects at least a few times a day. 2. You can connect this to multiple devices at the same time but it keeps disconnecting from one or the other. Basically you just wanna stick to one device at a time. 3. Battery life is meh. 4. The design that makes these earplugs reach all the way to your belly button is poor and that makes you not wanna wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mehdi

customer_reviews.title: Only last a year, no warranty.
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I don't give a review right away is that I need to use the product to know if it works before giving a review. This headphone is excellent. It lasts only one year, it stops charging and is not coming on. I brought it because it guarantees three years. When I seek to get to the website, the site does not exist. This is when I notice no contact information on the product, no phone number, or email. I brought this because of the three years guarantee. You can, too, just remember it will only last precisely one year.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, fantastic support
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without these headphones. My Bose, wired, in-ear headphones don't come close to the sound quality of these. And the battery life is phenomenal. I had an issue with the pair I bought and RHA support sent me a new one. They were great to work with. These come with an absurd number of ear tips. My only gripe is I wish there were ear tips with wings, but I've gotten used to the silicone ones.
customer_reviews.author: An Optimist

customer_reviews.title: Professional finish headphones with great battery life and sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have ~9 hrs of battery life. I've used them for the gym, they work great. Although you're going to have to get used to running with them. Sounds is pretty neutral at low and mid volumes, at high volume they become uncomfortably bright (personally not preferred). Look and finish are very nice, they're great for the office. They come with various earphones tips for all sizes. When not in use, I hang them from my shirt's neck and now one of the ear loops is bend opposite to the contour of my ear, part my fault. However, it would be nice to make this section more rigid.
customer_reviews.author: flow21

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING service! After a year of use left cable separated from the hook. I have contacted warranty department and after exchanging few emails with details company sent new set in a few days. I can not be more happier with headphones and service! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: rxk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have had these wireless headphones for barely over a month and they have intermittently dropped connections with my Samsung Note 7 from nearly the start. I don't know what to say. I have owned various other bluetooth headsets and this has never been a problem before. This technology should work effortlessly and seamlessly from the outset.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Witheiler

customer_reviews.title: I would add these surgically to my ears.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of the kind Really can't find a complaint. The sound is amazing after about 32 hours of burn in the brightness and smooth lows are beautiful. The comfort is the just as good. I wear them all day never take them out, you hear the background noise, I work construction its important to be able hear back ground noise and talk. They are not noise cancelling sooo. They come with a nice assortment of ear peaces that add to more or less bass. Also, all more back ground noise or not. These are as close to perfect you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen V. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Great battery life. Sound quality is good when headphones are inserted into ear fully & properly per instructions. I’m pleased not to have separate wings attachments to deal with as I did with my last set from different manufacturers. My only problem so far is the USB charging cable. After only a couple months the contact seems to be loose & I have a very difficult time getting it to charge the headphones. I’m going to have to contact customer service for a solution. Other than that I am very happy with my purchase & I am somewhat picky about sound quality when listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my workout way more enjoyable and they DO NOT SLIP or slide when running, sweating and jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Carol I.

customer_reviews.title: Will stay in place with only earbud in place
customer_reviews.text: I was not as concerned with audio quality since most of my use was for audio books. Normally I only have the right ear bud inserted for listening but had problems with the weight pulling the unit to my left. Only recently discovered that all I had to do was take the left magnetic tip and attach it to the right one in my ear to secure everything in place. It is also nice to have my phone and iPad connected at the same time. Quality product that was worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Not so great staying in my ears, perhaps because the cord is fairly heavy with the pieces attached to either side. I find the control mechanism hard to navigate without looking at it, the raised buttons are difficult to feel. If it’s sound quality you are looking for, these are for you. If you are sensitive to the weight of the cord, and maybe using them to workout, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for about a year now and the benefits do not outweigh the negatives. The sound is good and the battery life isn't too bad but nearly every time I go to use it I need to reconnect to the device. Listening to music all day and shortly disconnect for 10 minutes? need to reconnect. Just closed my laptop? reconnect. I was excited to get rid of headphones that I need to plug in but right now I'm using headphones 5% of the cost of these expensive ones. Lastly the ear pieces wont stay in my ears for the life of me. They straighten out constantly and then they snag on EVERYthing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to know!
customer_reviews.text: Love the headset, did not care much for the design, however, the sound is outstanding. Note, the earpiece fits around the ear and if you wear glasses, well, not super comfortable. I ride a road bike and Peloton indoor bike generating a lot of sweat. After on a few months the phone would no longer charge. I think it's due to the sweat. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I found these earbuds to be a superior item. A few months later, the battery dies after an intermittent 2 hour use for phone calls only. There is no warning that the battery is dying. Conversations are simply dropped. Since I was using the earbuds for business calls, this is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Shapack

customer_reviews.title: Defective Design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as I had wired RHA headphones that rocked. I was excited to get these. I was once again loving these until the power button and the control stopped working. Figured I got a bum set so I returned them for a replacement pair. Guess what, same thing happened with the replacement set. I searched online and quite a few people are having this same exact issue. It is truly unfortunate. I loved my RHA wired headset and these sounded great, when they worked. For now I will use something else. I hope RHA rights this and foxes this defect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Rudnick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but
customer_reviews.text: able to get great sound quality using the molding ear tips. but they gradually work out and have to be replaced, to maintain the sound quality. I would welcome any suggestions to maintain the fit for more than 1-2 hours without repositioning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hausserman

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought these five headphones ago!
customer_reviews.text: These are the single most comfortable earbuds I have ever owned (and I have owned countless). I loved the Shure headphones these replaced, and they sound even better than my amazing Shure earbuds. They charge fast, and have the longest charge (twelve hours) of my last three earbuds’ combined charged hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth not quite strong :(
customer_reviews.text: At first it took some getting used to, the sound is great and the battery is quite good I can use it all day. However, the distance of the Bluetooth is not that great the sound keeps cutting out so I am not liking that.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxx L

customer_reviews.title: best blue tooth i have had
customer_reviews.text: came from beats pros , and im adjusting well. sound is fantastic , and I use about 16hrs a week and charge once a week. sound quality is outstanding for a wireless headset , and good up to 50ft from host. too a few days to get ear pieces to break in but would buy aging
customer_reviews.author: loganx

customer_reviews.title: Good for cycling & yoga but bounces around on trail runs & plyo
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great and looks great. The back strap kinda swings all over the place if you’re jumping around. The retention clip up front is flimsy so doesn’t hold too well.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Duong

customer_reviews.title: Good sound & service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and battery works well. I easily swap between calls and music all day. One complaint is that the back of ear form breaks easily and will not stay in the ears well after 1 year. However they sent me a replacement quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bewilson12

customer_reviews.title: Loss of microphone functionality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and loved this product for 9 months and lately the microphone has grown less and less sensitive to input, making it essentially useless for online conversation. This is too bad because the sound quality is quite good. Not as good as the wired high-end RHA products but satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sound was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I will give up on finding a decent sound in wireless earbuds. There was a warning in a review about the lack of base in these specific wireless buds...and the review was spot on. I have returned them. Going back to a wired set. Maybe one day!
customer_reviews.author: Bonno

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would sound better for the price. I also didn't like batteries flopping around when i would do bench press. Earbuds are also super heavy because they are metal. I wish i liked them because the build quality is insane and they look dope lol.
customer_reviews.author: Zam Wack

customer_reviews.title: They vibrate?!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of reviews about the sound quality which give a much better description than I will, what blows me away is that they put nfc a vibration function in. If you are like me sometimes you don't feel your phone getting a call which I used to wear a smart watch to compensate for, now I'm going to stick with these puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else is that.
customer_reviews.text: RHA MA750 - Horrible sound, I never came across any other earbuds with this low sound quality. However the looks and the design are pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: TML

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Don't even know I'm wearing them. Possible abd shift material grey feels durable. Haven't really put them through a sweat test.i may go backto this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: nbz59wr

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Earplugs don’t stay in the best Disconnects sometimes Good battery
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight Earplugs don’t stay in the best Disconnects sometimes Good battery life
customer_reviews.author: chris comisky

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Fought with CRApple for close to 240minutes on their service chat about a failed set of BeatsX <-- absolute garbage and the CRApples warranty service is worse than the garbage their are selling. Researched these and they are stellar! She loves them more than the BeatsX, sound better are built better.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: Have bought many pair of different Bluetooth headphones and earbuds. These are so far one of the best I have purchased. Really love the sound and battery life is best of all of them
customer_reviews.author: Tejanogrande

customer_reviews.title: 2 month review
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is around 8 hours. Charge time is shorter than any other wireless headphones I have owned. Sound is fantastic. When these eventually break I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D.B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, uses usb type c port for charging, the material is great. Battery life could be longer
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: Pass on These
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound when they are working. As others have reported these have serious connections issues unless you are being perfectly still. The issue seems to get worse with age. RHA is not very repsonsive.
customer_reviews.author: RMX3

customer_reviews.title: manufacturer descriptions not always completely accurate
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase, with two exceptions: 12-hour battery life is misleading. At most, 8-10 hours; controls are too small and manual not clear as to accepting calls and fast forwarding music.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Alvey

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of headphones. For the price they are, they give great sound quality and connectivity. 2 thumbs up here. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp treble and overly emphasized bass. The titanium enclosures hurt after less than an hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Max Nakfoor

customer_reviews.title: These earphones are great when they work
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are great when they work. However, after about 3 months of usage, I'm sometimes having static issues that distort the sound and don't stop until i switch them off and then back on. I would give them 5 stars if it weren't for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sanie

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and sound.
customer_reviews.text: The best Wireless Earphones I have ever owned. They do need at least 40 hours play in before the sound opens up and the bass improves.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Boström

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy pairing, great fit
customer_reviews.text: These earphones were a replacement for Beats Earphones. The sound is SO much better. No issues at all in pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! These are all and more that they claim to be! Fit and sound perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sunlite

customer_reviews.title: Defect in Product (outer part) but good choice for sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I just wish they had not given a bad piece to me. I have to travel from nxt day so ordered this on same day delivery. Sad to see the mark on it. Doesnt seem like a new one (see the first pic attached). Rest sound seems good. I am out on travel so dnt hv the luxury to return this and order new.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 4 star the volume on high is not quiet loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: D Dengate

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ride a mower and they still sound great. Have yet to max out volume.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Keeps Breaking DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The power button broke after six months on both my original and on my replacement units (replaced under warranty). Do not buy this product unless you want to deal with submitting twice annual warranty claims.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Puneky

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds have died
customer_reviews.text: They earbuds worked great for about a year and then completely died...will not turn back on..very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kerrym Evensong

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds and great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds and great comfort. I'm only disappointed that the battery level gets announced at fairly sparse intervals. I want to listen to music not the announcement.
customer_reviews.author: David Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: 3 year warranty and just shy of 2 years they stop working
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on Feb. 1, 2018 and have used them daily, all day. My understanding is they have a 3 year warranty. As of January 20, 2020, they no longer work!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Ear plugs need a storage port
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is how the ear plugs just hang
customer_reviews.author: Miss Marsha

customer_reviews.title: high quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: the design of the headphone surpassed my expectation and the battery life amazing at 7+ hours. the audio quality is good but i feel they have room for improvement. overall this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stickers are just annoying
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? When you take off this sticker the first time, the silicone came off too?
customer_reviews.author: A Lonely God

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it despite lost signal
customer_reviews.text: It has typical RHA defect - signal loses one time an our or two for a second. But sound is perfect. Good niose isolation with sponge plugs
customer_reviews.author: Georgy

customer_reviews.title: $150 Clean Looks and Convenience, Not $150 Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a pair of workout headphones. They sound very clean but the isolation isn't the best even though the silicone tips fill my entire canal comfortably. They express themselves in the mid range but aren't the bassiest out there. The sound is accurate but honestly... I expected more powerful sound from a set of headphones that have an external base to keep additional components and the battery separate. I'm going to keep them since the build quality is fantastic. I tend to go through a lot of headphones due to heavy abuse in workouts and outdoor activities. However, once these die, I'm going to look for something with a lot more umph.
customer_reviews.author: chazkez

customer_reviews.title: Another quality RHA purchase
customer_reviews.text: RHA use premium materials, and sound very good to this untrained ear. Seller made transaction easy and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL B COOK

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to Klipsch and others it’s beed great! Buttons for control could be a bit more defined but all around great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working After 6 months use
customer_reviews.text: Only had headphones for six months and now do not work at all. They will not charge or turn on for use. Poor quality considering cost.
customer_reviews.author: A F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good sound. Enclosed in the package, it offers a lot of of earpiece plugin choices. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely died before 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my son. They worked really well and the battery life seemed to last all day. He has only had them for 6 months and now they are completely dead. They won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Great mic quality good audio
customer_reviews.text: Needed better mic quality than current headset so gave it a try. Very happy with this overall. Audio is decent but not strong base. Customer service is best yet. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MileHiKid

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - no service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 45 days or so. No response from anyone on how to repair/replace. Lesson learned - never again.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Rha ma 750 wireless is the best Bluetooth running headphone I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: i got some problems with my headphones, I couldn't find any way to contact with rha so I can I contat them
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. Sound good to listen to all day.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Great battery life, lasts me a full day of work (7am-5pm). I love them.
customer_reviews.author: C D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but expected more?
customer_reviews.text: Battery last forever and charges full in no time. I expected a little better sound quality I guess but I have nothing to compare these to.
customer_reviews.author: Fzn_tdra

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best pair of wireless headphones I've ever owned. Sound quality is phenomenal and even when I forget to charge the battery for a couple days they're still close to full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Lack of bass on this, troubles trying to power on, very poor battery life, overpriced and yesterday they stop working, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like them, but if they don't work with every ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to listen to them. In my pursuit of the "USB C all the things" dream I ordered these and almost immediately sent them back. They started to charge form the included USB A adapter, and from a small USB power bank, but none of my wall chargers (which work on my phone and Chromebooks) made the charging indicator light up. I really wanted to like them, but if they don't work with every USB charger I have then they may as well use a proprietary connector.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid $125 for these and received them on March 7. You would think I would have no issues for hat kind of money spent. Well you woul be wrong. I used them for running and as if last Tuesday they don’t work at all. They won’t turn on. It started with severe static and then they just quit working. Wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bluetooth earbuds with excellent sound. Best BT earbuds I have used to date.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The battery charge lasts, with normal music listening for ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery charge lasts, with normal music listening for approximately 1.5 - 2 hours and requires an immediate recharge. This product is NOT worthy of its price.
customer_reviews.author: ~III~

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying these as I am writing this review ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying these as I am writing this review, well constructed, let’s see how the battery lasts. So far all is as advertised and the reviews really helped my decision. Feel free to reach out for any updates
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: ... a number of years and have yet to be disappointed! I understand that headphones and such listening devices ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been with these folks for a number of years and have yet to be disappointed! I understand that headphones and such listening devices are very subjective...for me the RHA headphones have been my go to devices. The sound clarity on these wireless headphones is fantastic. The battery life is great (I have had upwards of 9 hrs of continuous use (long flight), and did not run out of power). Standby time is great too. I have not had any issues pairing the headphone with a number of devices.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Sen

customer_reviews.title: I like my $10 Motorola headphones better
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. I have had these for one day, and I am requesting a refund. They keep disconnecting from my phone, and the left ear piece randomly starts making a loud, screeching noise. Don’t waste your money. I would rate these 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: these weren't very good quality in terms of sound
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these weren't very good quality in terms of sound. They were very comfortable to wear, but when I started up music there was very little (if any) bass and the high end sounded very 'tinny'. I returned them and will look for something with a wider range of frequency. Disappointing for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Haugen

customer_reviews.title: No BASS at all
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can complain about is the sound; the BASS is so much poor in this supposed to be high end headphones. If they can’t build in bass support headphones then make an app that comes with it, just like Jaybirds.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with laptop
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my laptop. In fact somehow it changed all of my Bluetooth settings when it did finally connect. As for audio with my phone it sounded pretty dull and almost like it was blown out from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Wez

customer_reviews.title: Best battery life I have seen - But keep disconnecting from iPad
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. One issue. They regularly disconnect from my iPad. Easy to reconnect but its annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Goryunov

product_meta.title: RHA MA750 Wireless: 12 Hour Battery Life Bluetooth Noise Isolating In-Ear Headphones with Universal Remote & Microphone, 3 Year Warranty included
product_meta.description:
The MA750 Wireless combines the premium metal construction, sophisticated design and accurate, balanced audio of RHA's acclaimed MA750 with premium wireless features and unrivalled battery life.

BOX CONTAINS



1x MA750 Wireless In-Ear Headphone
1x USB A to C Charging Cable
6x Pairs of Dual Density Silicone Ear Tips (S/M/L)
2x Pairs of Double Flange Ear Tips (S/L)
2x Pairs of Comply Foam Ear Tips (M)
1x Stainless Steel Ear Tip Holder
1x Cable Clip
1x Mesh Carry Case
1x MA Wireless User Manual
feature_bullets: Unrivalled clarity and balance provided by RHA's handmade 560.1 dynamic drivers & signature Aerophonic 303F grade Stainless Steel housings
CD-like quality Bluetooth audio thanks to AptX & AAC technology
12 hours playback; 30 days standby. Pairing- NFC/Bluetooth. Frequency Range-16- 22,000Hz
IPX4 rated sweat-proof and water resistant for gym or sports use
Includes 3 year warranty, universal remote & noise isolating Comply Foam earphone tips for 2x external dB reduction
